headline: HSBC upgrades Keurig Dr Pepper as soft drinks momentum offsets coffee weakness
summary: Investing.com -- HSBC upgraded Keurig Dr Pepper (NASDAQ:KDP) to Buy from Hold and raised its target price to $42 from $36, citing strong first-quarter results in soft drinks that supported the company’s full-year guidance despite a weak consumer environment and tariff volatility.

headline: Keurig Q1 Earnings & Sales Beat, U.S. Refreshing Beverages Up 11%
summary: KDP's Q1 results show robust top- and bottom-line growth, driven by double-digit gains in U.S. Refreshing Beverages and strong momentum across key categories.
